scripts.build:chrome-prod: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='chrome'  webpack --config webpack/webpack.prod.js
scripts.build:edge-prod: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='edge'    webpack --config webpack/webpack.prod.js
scripts.build:firefox-prod: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='firefox' webpack --config webpack/webpack.prod.js
scripts.build:chrome: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='chrome'  webpack --config webpack/webpack.dev.js
scripts.build:edge: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='edge'    webpack --config webpack/webpack.dev.js
scripts.build:firefox: rimraf dist && cross-env BROWSER='firefox' webpack --config webpack/webpack.dev.js
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:firefox-prod && web-ext run --source-dir dist --firefox=firefoxdeveloperedition
scripts.start: npm run build:firefox && concurrently --names firefox,webpack "web-ext run --watch-files --source-dir dist --firefox=firefoxdeveloperedition" "npm run watch:firefox"
